# English Phoneme Dictionary - Custom Pronunciation Guide
# Format: word phoneme1 phoneme2 ...
# Note: Phonemes use CMU (Carnegie Mellon University) Pronouncing Dictionary style

# Technology terms with custom pronunciations
AI ey ay
TTS t iy t iy eh s
GPU jh iy p iy y uw
API ey p iy ay
ML eh m eh l
NLP eh n eh l p iy
UI y uw ay
UX y uw eh k s
CSS s iy eh s eh s
HTML ey ch t iy eh m eh l

# Names and brands
Google g uw g ah l
Microsoft m ay k r ow s aa f t
Apple ae p ah l
Amazon ae m ah z aa n
Facebook f ey s b uh k
Twitter t w ih t er
LinkedIn l ih ng k t ih n
GitHub g ih t hh ah b
Python p ay th aa n
Java jh aa v ah

# Common phrases
hello hh ah l ow
world w er l d
artificial aa r t ah f ih sh ah l
intelligence ih n t eh l ah jh ah n s
machine m ah sh iy n
learning l er n ih ng
neural n uh r ah l
network n eh t w er k
speech s p iy ch
synthesis s ih n th ah s ih s

# Technical jargon
algorithm ae l g er ih dh ah m
computation k aa m p y uw t ey sh ah n
interface ih n t er f ey s
latency l ey t ah n s iy
bandwidth b ae n d w ih d th
protocol p r ow t ah k aa l
database d ey t ah b ey s
server s er v er
client k l ay ah n t
endpoint eh n d p oy n t

# Difficult pronunciations
hors_d'oeuvre ao r d er v
rendezvous r aa n d ey v uw
queue k y uw
colonel k er n ah l
paradigm p ae r ah d ay m
cache k ae sh
yacht y aa t
subtle s ah t ah l
receipt r ih s iy t
faux_pas f ow p aa
